# UIStatusBarAnimation

**Enumeration**

Constants that specify the animation of the status bar as it’s hidden or made visible.

## Declaration

```swift
enum UIStatusBarAnimation
```

## Overview

Constants of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIStatusBarAnimation] type are arguments of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIApplication/setStatusBarHidden(_:with:)] method.

## Constants

- **UIStatusBarAnimation.none**: No animation is applied to the status bar as it is shown or hidden.
- **UIStatusBarAnimation.fade**: The status bar fades in and out as it is shown or hidden, respectively.
- **UIStatusBarAnimation.slide**: The status bar slides in or out as it is shown or hidden, respectively.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Deprecated enumerations

- **UIDirectionalRectEdge**: Constants that specify an edge or a set of edges, taking the user interface layout direction into account.
